title: One Moment
description: In this Dateline classic, when Crystal Taylor is murdered, her sisters are determined to find the killer. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 20, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
